encyclopaedia.encyclopaedia module¶

class encyclopaedia.encyclopaedia.Encyclopaedia(sorting_mode=0, show_locked_buttons=False, show_locked_entry=False, entry_screen='encyclopaedia_entry', tint_locked_image=True)[source]¶

Bases: renpy.store.object

Container that manages the behaviour of a collection of EncEntry objects.

Parameters

  • sorting_mode (int) – The type of sorting used. Default sorting is by Number.

  • show_locked_buttons (bool) – If True, locked entries show a placeholder label on the listing screen.

  • show_locked_entry (bool) – If True, locked entries can be viewed, but the data is hidden from view with a placeholder.

  • entry_screen (str) – The Ren’Py screen to display an open entry.

all_entries¶

All entries, regardless of status.

Type

list

unlocked_entries¶

Only unlocked entries.

Type

list

filtered_entries¶

Entries that match a subject filter.

Type

list

filtering¶

The subject that’s being used as a filter.

Type

bool|str

size_all¶

Length of self.all_entries.

Type

int

size_unlocked¶

Length of self.unlocked_entries.

Type

int

reverse_sorting¶

Should sorting occur in reverse or not.

Type

bool

nest_alphabetical_sort¶

Should alphabetical sorting display each letter as a subject.

Type

bool

current_position¶

Index for the current entry open.

Type

int

sub_current_position¶

Index for the current sub-entry open. Starts at 1.

Type

int

labels¶

The current label controller.

Type

Labels

subjects¶

Collection of every subject.

Type

list

active¶

The currently open entry.

Type

EncEntry

locked_at_bottom¶

If locked entries should appear at the bottom of the entry list or not.

Type

bool

add_entry(entry)[source]¶

Adds an entry to the Encyclopaedia’s internal lists and sorts it.

Attempts to create duplicates are softly ignored. subjects list is updated when a new entry is added.

Parameters

entry (EncEntry) – The Entry to add to the Encyclopaedia

add_entry_to_unlocked_entries(entry)[source]¶

Adds an entry to the list of unlocked entries.

Parameters

entry (EncEntry) – The Entry to add to the unlocked entries list.

check_position(op, position, wall)[source]¶

Determines if the Prev/Next Actions should be active or not.

Parameters

  • op (str) – The operator to use

  • position (int) – The position of the entry

  • wall (int) – The limit to check against

Returns

bool

property current_entries¶

Depending on which viewing options are set, returns a list of entries.

Type

list

property number_of_visible_entries¶

Whatever the maximum size of the entry list should be, based on if locked entries should be shown or not.

Type

int

operators = {'<=': <built-in function le>, '>=': <built-in function ge>}¶
property percentage_unlocked¶

Gets the percentage of the Encyclopaedia that’s unlocked.

Returns

Percentage of the Encyclopaedia that’s unlocked

Return type

float

Raises

ZeroDivisionError – If the Encyclopaedia is empty

set_global_locked_image_tint(tint_amount)[source]¶

Sets all the locked images for all entries to use the same tint.

Parameters

tint_amount (tuple) – An RGB value, ie:(R, G, B)

set_global_locked_name(placeholder)[source]¶

Sets all the locked names for all entries to the same string.

Parameters

placeholder (str) – Text to use for every locked name

sort_entries(entries, sorting=0, reverse=False)[source]¶

Sort entry lists by whatever the current sorting mode is.

Parameters

  • entries (list) – The entry list to sort

  • sorting (int) – The sorting mode to use

  • reverse (bool) – If the sorting should be done in reverse or not
